scripts.test: echo '[test] Running tests...' && sleep 1 && echo '[test] Tests completed!' && exit 0
scripts.test-fail: echo '[test-fail] Running tests...' && sleep 1 && echo '[test-fail] Tests failed!' && exit 1
scripts.build: echo '[build] Building project...' && sleep 0.5 && echo '[build] Build completed!'
scripts.dev: echo '[dev] Starting dev server...' && sleep 0.5 && echo '[dev] Dev server running on http://localhost:3000' && sleep 10
scripts.start: echo '[start] Starting server...' && echo '[start] Server running on http://localhost:8080' && sleep 10
scripts.lint: echo '[lint] Running linter...' && echo '[lint] No issues found!'
scripts.error: echo '[error] Starting with error...' && echo 'Error: Something went wrong!' >&2 && exit 1
scripts.long-running: echo '[long] Long running process...' && sleep 30 && echo '[long] Process done'
